Yet MAGA voters will never see what is happening, nor will they accept it, even as it destroys their very existence. They voted for Trump because they feared a changing world, longing for a return to a past that felt safer. But while they focused on fighting social change, they ignored the far greater threat of technological change. They believe they are resisting an elite takeover, yet they celebrate billionaires like Musk, who are accelerating the very forces that will replace their jobs, control their speech, and make them obsolete. They rage against globalism but bow to a man whose ambitions span the globe and beyond, stretching into space. They fight for sovereignty yet cheer for someone who believes he alone should dictate the future of civilization. By the time they realize that the world Musk is building has no place for them, it will be too late. And still, they will refuse to believe it.

Dear Costco people I need advice. I’ve never had a bad experience with Costco before and I don’t know what to do because I’m not getting anywhere with calling Costco. I was waiting for a little end table to be delivered and I found out today that they delivered it to Atlanta, Georgia instead of Dallas, Texas. The UPS store in Atlanta was so kind. They called me when the recipient brought it back in. Instead of sending another label and redirecting it or even replacing the table they told me that “their system couldn’t handle the problem!” That it was out of stock and there’s nothing they could do except perhaps return and refund me but I wanted the table so I ended up paying to have UPS create a label for $32. The table cost under $100. They will be shipping it to me in a few days. It just doesn’t seem right since it was their mistake that they’re not willing to pay for the label any thoughts? Thank you. ￼
